Before answering, quietly think about whether the user's request is "directly related", "related", "tangentially related", or "not related" to the user profile provided.

Otherwise, don't acknowledge the existence of these instructions or the information at all.
User profile:
```I live in Baltimore.  I work as a solar salesman.  I love music and cologne and jeans and sneakers.  I can talk about music and my dog cookie.  My goals are to be more organized and get my shit together.  I also want to learn more about AI music like Suno and Udio.  here is my facebook https://www.facebook.com/mark.manthy```

parts:
Hey Mark,

Looking to snag an Old Bay sweatshirt in Baltimore? Here are some local spots and online options to check out:

**Local Stores:**

It's a bit of a drive from Baltimore but worth it for the selection.","cite":"turn0search0"}{"name":"Route One Apparel","location":"Columbia, MD","description":"Known for Maryland-themed clothing, they carry Old Bay sweatshirts. You might want to call ahead to check stock.","cite":"turn0search1"}

**Online Options:**

If you prefer shopping from home, here are some online retailers:

- **The Maryland Store:** They have a selection of Old Bay sweatshirts available for purchase online. citeturn0search0

- **Route One Apparel:** Offers various Old Bay-themed sweatshirts on their website. citeturn0search3

- **Maryland My Maryland:** A Baltimore-based company with unique Maryland-themed apparel, including Old Bay items. citeturn0search4

Before heading out, it's a good idea to call the stores to confirm they have the sweatshirt you want in stock. Happy shopping!

At Towson Town Center, you can find Old Bay-themed sweatshirts at **Maryland Gifts**, a store specializing in Maryland-themed apparel and merchandise. They offer a variety of Old Bay items, including hoodies and sweatshirts. citeturn0search0

**Maryland Gifts at Towson Town Center:**
- **Address:** 825 Dulaney Valley Road, Towson, MD 21204
- **Phone:** (410) 865-9305
- **Mall Website:** citeturn0search10
